message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I think it's a great opportunity for you to acquire a unique asset. I'm willing to start the negotiation at a price of $1200000. What do you think?

Thanks for the offer, Alice.  While I appreciate the value of this product, $1200000 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $850000 for it. This is my best offer, as I'm also considering another option.

I understand you're considering other options, Bob, but I'm confident this product will bring you significant value. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $1050000. This is a fair price considering the product's worth to you is $800000.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise. However,  $1050000 is still above my budget. I'm sticking to my previous offer of $850000. This is a fair price considering the product's value to me, and I'm prepared to walk away if we can't reach an agreement.

I understand you're firm on your budget, Bob, but I'm not willing to go below $1000000. I'm willing to make one more compromise, so I'm counteroffering at $980000. This is the lowest I'm willing to go, and I'm confident it's still a fair price considering the product's value to you.
